com.wj.android.messageviewer.io

Class ExtractTarGz

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wj.android.messageviewer.io.ExtractTarGz

  • public class ExtractTarGz
extends java.lang.Object
    This utility class encapsulates static methods to facilitate extraction of the contents of a tar.gz file to a destination directory.
    Author:
    Werner Jaeger

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • extractTarGzAndFindFirst

        public static java.io.File extractTarGzAndFindFirst(java.io.File inputFile,
                                    java.io.File outputDir,
                                    java.lang.String strFileNameToFind)
        Extract the given input tar file to given output directory.

        Returns the first file with the given filename found in the output directory. File name comparison is case sensitive.

        Output directory including any necessary but nonexistent parent directories are created.

        If input file can have tar.gz or .tar extension.

        Parameters:
        inputFile - the tar or tar.gz archive to extract.
        outputDir - the directory to extract the archive to.
        strFileNameToFind - file name (without path) to look for.
        Returns:
        if a file with with the name given in strFileNameToFind was extracted to the output directory the full path of the first found file is returned, otherwise null.

      • extractTarGz

        public static java.util.List<java.io.File> extractTarGz(java.io.File inputFile,
                                        java.io.File outputDir)
        Extract the given input tar file to given output directory.

        Output directory including any necessary but nonexistent parent directories are created.

        If input file can have tar.gz or .tar extension.

        Parameters:
        inputFile - the tar or tar.gz archive to extract.
        outputDir - the directory to extract the archive to.
        Returns:
        The List of Files with the untared content or null if an error occurred.
